channel.title: Read this!
channel.description: I have a client and source. I have replaced the 127.0.0.1 with my ip address in the gui.java in the client. Then i compiled it and now i can connect. But when i uploaded it for people to download they just get error connecting to server. I know there is nothing wrong with source becaues people can connect to the webclient link and play but it just has alot of nulls..... So if anyone could teamview with me or just tell me what im doing wrong i would appreciate it. Thank You! -K3xJTAG

item.title: Read this!
item.dc:creator: @isotonic2011 isotonic2011
item.description:
@isotonic2011 wrote:

your supposed to leave the 127.0.0.1 then make a copy to give out to people with the actual server ip thats what i do.

Read full topic
